dndUpdatedUser.summary: Do not Disturb settings changed for a member.

connectionError.summary: Event received when a connection error happens.

channelHistoryChanged.summary: Bulk updates were made to a channel's history.

emojiRemoved.summary: A custom emoji has been removed.

message.summary: A message was sent to a channel.

accountsChanged.summary: The list of accounts a user is signed into has changed.

emojiAdded.summary: A custom emoji has been added.

commandsChanged.summary: A slash command has been added or changed.

imMarked.summary: A direct message read marker was updated.

dndUpdated.summary: Do not Disturb settings changed for the current user.

goodbye.summary: The server intends to close the connection soon.

emailDomainChanged.summary: The workspace email domain has changed.

outgoingMessage.summary: A message was sent to a channel.

channelMarked.summary: Your channel read marker was updated.

memberLeftChannel.summary: A user left a public or private channel.

groupHistoryChanged.summary: Bulk updates were made to a private channel's history.

groupMarked.summary: A private channel read marker was updated.

memberJoinedChannel.summary: A user joined a public or private channel.
